summary: Add a repository to an app installation
description:
Add a single repository to an installation. The authenticated user must have admin access to the repository.

You must use a personal access token (which you can create via the [command line](https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line/) or the [OAuth Authorizations API](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/v3/oauth_authorizations/#create-a-new-authorization)) or [Basic Authentication](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/v3/auth/#basic-authentication) to access this endpoint.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: This API is under preview and subject to change.

previews.name: machine-man
previews.note:
To access the API with your GitHub App, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/v3/media) in the `Accept` Header for your requests.
```shell
application/vnd.github.machine-man-preview+json
```
